name: MPSAlphaType
desc: Premultiplication description for the color channels of an image.

items.name: case nonPremultiplied
items.desc: The image is not premultiplied by alpha. Alpha is not guaranteed to be 1. (CGImageAlphaInfo.first/CGImageAlphaInfo.last)

items.name: case alphaIsOne
items.desc: Alpha is guaranteed to be 1, even if it is not encoded as 1 or not encoded at all. (CGImageAlphaInfo.noneSkipFirst/CGImageAlphaInfo.noneSkipLast, CGImageAlphaInfo.none)

items.name: case premultiplied
items.desc: The image is premultiplied by alpha. Alpha is not guaranteed to be 1. (CGImageAlphaInfo.premultipliedFirst/CGImageAlphaInfo.premultipliedLast)
